short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select text, right click and search it on Youtube directly. Directly find a video from a text on a website with 2 clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add a button when you select and right click on a text. This button will open Youtube to search video from the selected text. 
No need to copy/paste and waste time.
